text: [email protected]/* <![CDATA[ */!function(t,e,r,n,c,a,p){try{t=document.currentScript||function(){for(t=document.getElementsByTagName('script'),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute('data-cfhash'))return t[e]}();if(t&&(c=t.previousSibling)){p=t.parentNode;if(a=c.getAttribute('data-cfemail')){for(e='',r='0x'+a.substr(0,2)|0,n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)e+='%'+('0'+('0x'+a.substr(n,2)^r).toString(16)).slice(-2);p.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(decodeURIComponent(e)),c)}p.removeChild(t)}}catch(u){}}()/* ]]> */ 2016 Red session. Golden colour, small head. Aroma is sour wood, brett funk and some earth. Flavour is dry wood, mild toffee, wood and some slight floral and funky notes. Nice dry funky aftertaste.
Bottle. Pours a slightly hazy golden color with a small white head. Has a fruity sour tart funky barnyard aroma. Fruity sour tart funky weak grassy flavor. Has a fruity sour tart funky finish.
Bottled. Amber coloured. Dense off white head. Aroma. Earth, sourness, barnyard. Flavour. Sourness, funk, barnyard.earth. Medium to full bodied.ends funky and earthy.
75 cl. bottle. Hazy yellow colour with a small white head. Aroma and flavour of yeast, spice, fruit, hops and tartness.

75 cl bottle. Pours clear and golden orange with a small white head. Aroma is fruity and slight wooden. Dry, fruity and mild citrusy. Mellow. Fruity and crisp fruity. Mellow fruity. Smooth fruity finish.

Bottle 750ml. @ CBC 2016 [ Red Session ]. - Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016, Oksnehallen Vesterbro, Halmtorvet 11, 1700 Copenhagen, Denmark. [ As Bokkereyder Zomergeuze 2015 ].Unclear medium orange yellow color with a average, frothy, good lacing, mostly lasting, off-white to white head. Aroma is moderate malty, pale malt, tart, moderate to heavy barnyard, leather, apple - grapes - citric, sulfur. Flavor is moderate sweet and light to moderate acidic with a long duration, tart, apple - grapes, barnyard, sulfur - manure, medium dry. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is soft to flat. [20160514]
Aroma of citrus, yuzu, grapefruit, passionfruit. Straight forward. Taste is floral, bright citrus, very refreshing with a slight hop bitterness.
Sample @ CBC16. Pours hazy golden with a small white head. Notes of citrus, bright apples, lemon, barnyard, vinegar, grapey.

Bottle 750ml @ CBC 2016, Red session, København
Pours hazy golden with a off-white head. Aroma has notes of malt, citrus, barnyard and horseblanket. Taste is light sweet and medium sour with a long dry, sour, funky and fruity finish. Body is medium, texture is thin to oily, carbonation is soft.
Keg at cbc16.. Golden amber.. Thin white lacing.. Soft funk fruit nose... Barnyard nose.. Long barnyard
Sample @ Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016 Red session 20160514. Fruity and bretty with grapefruits and notes of apricots. The finish is dry, fruity and bretty.

[5/14/16] Draught sample at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Red session. Cloudy golden. Great barnyard aroma with oak, fruitiness, sweat, leathery notes. Dry flavor, tart, barnyard, fruitiness. Medium-bodied. Great.
Sample @ CBC16, Copenhagen. Red session. Golden hazy pour with a small head. Notes of straw, minerals, barnyard, apple skin, light oak and some lingering tartness.

Bottle pour at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Pale orange with a white head. Aroma is funk, hint of cheese, citrus pith. Light bodied, funky on the palate with a dry finish. Taste is hard cheese, funk, citrus zest. So tasty.
CBC16, red session, bottle. Clear pale yellow with a white head. Aroma medium acidic, barnyard. Flavor light sweet, medium+ acidic, ending very dry. Light body.

Bottle @ CBC 2016. Hazy orange body, small white head. Nose is horsey brett notes, hay, straw and hints of lactic sour notes, tart berries and mild acetic tones. Taste is bretty stable tones, gooseberries, hay, straw and hints of sour lactic notes, minerals and wood. Light to medium body, high carbonation. Nice and classic-tasting bretty lambic. Drinkable and fresh.

Sample at CBC 2016. 

Hazy golden with a small white head. Sour with oak, light apricot, citrus, hay and funk.The finish was dry and tart. Tasty.

Bottle at CBC 16 Red Session. Pours a hazy light orange with a tiny white head. Tart and dry with a light sweetness. Aromas of sour grapes. Medium to light bodied. Medium carbonation. Dry and sour finish. Nice and fresh!

Red session, Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Hazy golden beer with a decent offwhite head. Sour rubber aroma, floral, grapefruit, hay notes, some citrus. Sour rubber flavor, grapefruit, floral notes, woody, some grapes. Quite ok.

From bottle @CBC 2016. 
poured sparkling golden color with no head. Farmyard, apricotty aroma.
Sour, dried fruits, tartness, apricots in flavor.
Nice mouthdrying finish. Intriguing. Very good.

Pours cloudy apricot with low white head
Aromas of cracked garden branch, tart apricots, over ripe red apples, garden leaves
Taste has tart notes of over ripe fruits, grapes, red apples, cracked garden branch
Pours hazy amber with low white head. Aroma of grass, grapes, green apples, bretta. Taste is mild apple tart with a light sweet finish. Light and smooth body with soft carbonation.
CBC2016. Trübes goldgelbes Bier mit geringen weißen Schaumkrone. Geruch trocken, säuerlich, steinobst. Geschmack leicht säuerlich fruchtig, steinobst, holzig, trocken.

duft: frisk syrlig funk citrus frisk
smag: sød frugt syrlig tør kant af funk

750ml bottle @ CBC 2016. Pours yellowish orange with a smooth head. Aroma of tart berries, farmyard, funky and sourish yeast and earthiness. Taste is earthy, funky and sourish with some berries and farmyardy notes. Finish is tart, slightly fruity and earthy with some sourness. Okay gueuze.

CBC 16. Very hazy orange with a small white head. Aroma of deep dry cellar funk, cobwebs and light citrus. Flavour is light to moderate sour. Light to medium bodied with soft carbonation. Soft and subtle easy drinking Gueze.
